data.title: Keizo Obuchi: The Visionary and Initiator of Japan’s Human Security Diplomacy
data.meta_description: Keizo ObuchiObuchi, Keizo was born as a son of Mitsuhei Obuchi, who managed a silk mill and later served as a legislator of the Lower House, in a town of Nakanojo-machi, Agatsuma-gun of Gunma Prefecture on 25 June 1937.
